org.nerd4j.csv.conf.mapping.ann

Annotation Type CSVFormatter


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=ANNOTATION_TYPE)
public @interface CSVFormatter
    Creates a CSVFormatter using the annotated JavaBean to retrieve the required configurations.

    Usage

    The CSVFormatter annotation is intended to be used inside the following annotations:

    • CSVWriter.

    This annotation is equivalent to the XML configuration csv:formatter.

    Author:
    Nerd4j Team

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      char fieldSep
      Character used to separate fields in the CSV source.
      char quote
      Character used to quote fields.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      char[] charsThatForceQuoting
      Set of characters that forces the whole field to be quoted.
      char[] charsToEscape
      Set of characters to be escaped during formatting.
      char escape
      Character used to escape other characters.
      char[] recordSep
      Characters used to separate records in the CSV source.

    • Element Detail

      • quote

        public abstract char quote
        Character used to quote fields.

        The character used by default is the double quote ["].

        Returns:
        character used to quote fields.

      • fieldSep

        public abstract char fieldSep
        Character used to separate fields in the CSV source.

        The character used by default is the comma [,].

        Returns:
        character used to separate fields.

      • escape

        public abstract char escape
        Character used to escape other characters.

        There is no default values for this feature.

        Returns:
        character used to escape other characters.
        Default:
        65535

      • recordSep

        public abstract char[] recordSep
        Characters used to separate records in the CSV source.

        By default the operating system line separator will be used.

        Returns:
        the character used as record separator.
        Default:
        65535

      • charsToEscape

        public abstract char[] charsToEscape
        Set of characters to be escaped during formatting.

        There is no default values for this feature.

        Returns:
        set of characters to be escaped.
        Default:
        65535

      • charsThatForceQuoting

        public abstract char[] charsThatForceQuoting
        Set of characters that forces the whole field to be quoted.

        The characters configured by default are:

        • space [ ];
        • comma [,];
        • horizontal tab [\t];
        • new line feed [\n].
        Returns:
        set of characters to ignore around fields.
        Default:
        65535
